annotations.contentText: Ich wünsche dir viel Erfolg und Spaß im neuen Job. Alles Gute! - Ralph
annotations.author: moerral

annotations.contentText: You joined the team in interesting times and your contribution to the semantic team was significant - together we managed to build a great product so I wish you even greater success in your next oportunity! Thank you and... my the Machine Learning be with you! Plamen
annotations.author: tanopla

annotations.contentText: Hi Johannes, thank you for being a great team lead! I enjoyed our weekly meetings, where you provided me with feedback, our social hangouts, and the great team climate, to which you contributed. For you future, I wish you all the best. Ruslan
annotations.author: sandrus

annotations.contentText: Thank you for everything Johannes! I've learnt a lot from you! Wish you all the best both in life and your next challenge! Lubo
annotations.author: yanelub

annotations.contentText: Dear Johannes, It's been a pleasure working with you at Drooms, unfortunately it was somewhat short. Life is moving ahead, it is a property of life. Starting a new job & moving to a new city looks like a big change. May this chapter in your life be filled with satisfaction and massive success. Thank you and hope to see you again someday. Nikolai der rote Punkt :)
annotations.author: krotnik

annotations.contentText: Dear Johannes, it was a pleasure working with you! I thoroughly enjoyed our talks and will definitely miss them. I wish you all the best & hope you'll have a great new start :) Best Dominik
annotations.author: terwdom

annotations.contentText: It was a real pleasure working with you! Wish you all the best and all the data on your way building the future of AI! Nikola P.S. Don't forget where Sofia is!
annotations.author: ralenik
